member.name: OFNOTIFYEXA
member.summary: Contains information about a CDN_INCLUDEITEM notification message.

member.name: OFNOTIFYEXA.hdr
member.summary: The code member of this structure identifies the notification message being sent.

member.name: OFNOTIFYEXA.lpOFN
member.summary: A pointer to an structure containing the values specified when the Open or Save As dialog box was created.

member.name: OFNOTIFYEXA.psf
member.summary: A pointer to the interface for the folder or shell name-space extension whose items are being enumerated.

member.name: OFNOTIFYEXA.pidl
member.summary: A pointer to an item identifier list that identifies an item in the container identified by the psf member. The item identifier is relative to the psf container.
